query:
SELECT m.id, m.name, m.slug, m.order, COUNT(p.id) as num_pages
FROM modules m
LEFT JOIN pages p ON p.moduleId = m.id
WHERE m.disciplineId = 1
GROUP BY m.id, m.name, m.slug, m.order
ORDER BY m.order
LIMIT 10;
